Class SetConstraints

  • java.lang.Object
    • SetConstraints

  • public class SetConstraints
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for other classes that need to add constraints to components in a quick and concise way CPSC 224-01, Spring 2020 Homework #4 No Sources to cite
    Version:
    v4.0 03/26/20
    Author:
    Eric Gustin

    • Method Detail

      • setConstraints

        public static void setConstraints(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                                  java.awt.Component component,
                                  int weightX,
                                  int weightY,
                                  int gridX,
                                  int gridY,
                                  int gridWidth,
                                  int gridHeight)
        Places constraints on a component and adds it to the JFrame
        Parameters:
        frame - is the frame that the components belong to
        component - is the component that the constraints will be put on
        weightX - determines how much the component is willing to move in the x direction as the frame changes size
        weightY - determines how much the component is willing to move in the y direction as the frame changes size
        gridX - column value
        gridY - row value
        gridWidth - number of columns it occupies
        gridHeight - number of rows it occupies
